REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f4045 reute r f BC-FLUOR-<FLR>-WINS-GENE 06-18 0080

TEXT.TITLE: FLUOR <FLR> WINS GENERAL ELECTRIC <GE> CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Fluor Corp said it won a contract with General Electric to design, construct and deliver modules for a methyl chloride process addition. The value of the contract was not disclosed. Fluor said its Applied Engineering Co unit will construct 28 modular sections and deliver them to GE's Waterford, N.Y. Silicone Products division plant. Methyl chloride is an integral part of silicone production. Reuter
